title: Summary
content: Experienced software engineer with 10+ years of professional experience building scalable web applications and distributed systems. Passionate about developer experience, clean code, and mentoring junior engineers. Currently focused on AI/ML platform development and GenAI applications.

title: Experience > Tech Corp
content:
Senior Engineer at Tech Corp (2019-2024)

- Led development of real-time data processing pipeline handling 10M+ events/day
- Architected and implemented microservices migration from monolithic Node.js application
- Mentored team of 4 junior engineers, conducting code reviews and pair programming sessions
- Reduced API latency by 60% through query optimization and caching strategies
- Technologies: TypeScript, React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Redis, GCP

title: Experience > StartupXYZ
content:
Full Stack Developer at StartupXYZ (2016-2019)

- Built customer-facing dashboard serving 50K+ monthly active users
- Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time from hours to minutes
- Developed RESTful APIs and GraphQL endpoints for mobile and web clients
- Technologies: JavaScript, React, Express, MongoDB, AWS

title: Skills
content:
Languages: TypeScript, JavaScript, Python, Go, SQL
Frontend: React, Next.js, Vue.js, Tailwind CSS
Backend: Node.js, Express, FastAPI, GraphQL
Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, Firestore
Cloud: GCP (Cloud Run, BigQuery, Pub/Sub), AWS (EC2, S3, Lambda)
Tools: Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, GitHub Actions
AI/ML: OpenAI API, Vertex AI, LangChain, RAG patterns

title: Education
content:
B.S. Computer Science, University of California, Berkeley (2012-2016)
- Graduated with Honors

- Senior project: Distributed key-value store implementation
